account.number-of-votes: Number of vote for the pass 24 hours
account.estimated-value: The calculated value dey base on the average of Steem for 7 days.
account.steem-description: STEEM na tokens wey you fit buy or sell, and you fit transfer am anytime wey you want. You fit change your STEEM to STEEM Power through wetin dem dey call powering up.
account.steem-power-description: Steem Power na token wey dey give power and the power go dey plenty join if you hold am for long time and if you dey vote people tori. The plenty the Steem Power wey you dey hold, the plenty your power to affect reward for people tori and the more wey you go dey earn onto say you vote people tori wella.
account.steem-dollars-description: The tokens na about $1 of STEEM
account.savings-description: The balance go take 3 days to withdraw
account.transaction-curation_reward: Reward For Post Wey You Upvote
account.points-post-desc: Share what post you like with your friends and earn 1 points.
account.points-comment-desc: Each comment you make helps you to grow your audience and make friendship but also earns you 5 points.
account.points-checkin-desc: Checking in on eSteem app gives you 0.25 points and helps you stay connected with your friends.
account.points-vote-desc: By voting you give reward to other creators and show your appreciation but also earn 0.01 x vote weight points.
account.points-reblog-desc: Share what post you like with your friends and earn 1 points.
account.points-login-desc: When you login into eSteem app you are entitled to earn 100 points automatically.
account.points-checkin-extra-desc: Consistent use of app gives you extra chances to earn more 10 points, be more active and earn more.
account.points-delegation-desc: You can earn 1 point per day for each 100SP delegation.

redeem.key-required-err: Active key could not be found for selected account. Please make sure you are logged in with proper credentials.

transfer.transfer-sub-title: Move money go another Steem account

transfer.power-up-sub-title: Tokens wey dey give you power over payment wey dey on top every tori, and wey go allow you  earn reward onto say you upvote people tori.
transfer.to-not-found: The person wey you dey try transfer money to no dey exist!
transfer.to-bad-actor: Make you dey careful dey send go this account.  Abeg check your spelling wella so that dem no go hack you.

transfer.amount-precision-error: Use only 3 numbers to make sure say e correct
transfer.memo-help: Na everybody go see this memo
